amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part A of House Report 118-362 to strike "actively assisting, or" from the offense provision.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to modify the bill's prohibition on fleeing a federal, state, or local law enforcement officer only if they are under the command of the U.S. Border Patrol, rather than any officer who is "actively assisting" the border patrol.
